title.narrative: M&E Assistance for Enhanced Results Reporting

description.narrative: The assignment aims at assisting relevant MFA-units, abroad as well as in Copenhagen, in achieving improvements in results reporting related to development cooperation activities through improved results frameworks for programmes and projects, including revised indicators, and through alternative reporting methodologies, as relevant.

The overall purpose of the results-reporting enhancement process of which the present assignment is part is threefold: (i) Comprehensive and timely information to the Danish Parliament and to the public on development results; (ii) Improvement of internal reporting and accountability structures making the results reported at unit level more informative; and (iii) Preparation of an annual Ministry scorecard linked to the SDGs, which will allow linking Danish results with global progress.
The assignment aims at assisting relevant MFA-units, abroad as well as in Copenhagen, in achieving improvements in results reporting related to development cooperation activities through improved results frameworks for programmes and projects and through alternative reporting methodologies, as relevant.
